> **isTestNet**(`algod`): `Promise`\<`boolean`\>

:::caution[Deprecated]
Use `await algorand.client.isTestNet()` or `await new ClientManager({ algod }).isTestNet()` instead.
:::

## Parameters

### algod

`AlgodClient`

## Returns

`Promise`\<`boolean`\>
